channel.title: The D&G 5037
channel.description: stLight.options({publisher:'28aa69bc-4c1b-4951-a75d-0d5639479fcb'});emailprintD&G are the offshoot brand of fashion house Dolce & Gabanna. They are the brand described as trendsetting and young, at the forefront of fashion. This ideology is certainly reflected in their eye wear, and they produce some of the most popular pieces around. The D&G 5037 are one of the top selling models in [...]
